btk.catalog module¶

The catalog module defines the Catalog class and its implementation for WeakLensingDeblending and COSMOS.

class btk.catalog.Catalog(catalog, verbose=False)¶

Bases: abc.ABC

Attributes
name

Methods

from_file(catalog_file, verbose)

Catalog constructor from input file

get_raw_catalog
__init__(catalog, verbose=False)¶

Returns astropy table with catalog name from input class.

Parameters

  • catalog – CatSim-like catalog or galsim COSMOS catalog to draw galaxies from.

  • verbose – Whether to print information related to loading catalog.

self.table¶

CatSim-like catalog.

Type

astropy.table
